data.title: Төгс Төгөлдөр Perfect 完美 Parfait مثالي: IMPORTANT INFORMATION FOR OWNERS OF RIO TINTO SHAREHOLDERS
data.meta_description: IMPORTANT INFORMATION FOR OWNERS OF    RIO TINTO SHAREHOLDERS             Organisational structure   The Rio Tinto Group consists of Rio Ti...
data.text:
Depositing or substituting the underlying sharesIssuance of ADSs against the deposit of shares, including deposits and issuance in respect of:

Share distributions, stock split, rights, merger

Exchange of securities or other transactions

Other events or distributions affecting the ADSs or the deposited securities

US$5.00 per 100 ADSs (or portion thereof) evidenced by the new ADSs delivered Selling or exercising rightsDistribution or sale of securities, the fee being in an amount equal to the fee for the execution and delivery of ADSs which would have been charged as a result of the deposit of such securitiesUS$5.00 for each 100 ADSs (or portion thereof) Withdrawing an underlying shareAcceptance of ADSs surrendered for withdrawal of deposited securitiesUS$5.00 for each 100 ADSs (or portion thereof) evidenced by the ADSs surrendered Transferring, splitting or grouping receiptsTransfers, combining or grouping of depositary receiptsUS$2.50 per ADS General depositary services, particularly those charged on an annual basis

Other services performed by the depositary in administering the ADRs

Provide information about the depositary’s right, if any, to collect fees and charges by offsetting them against dividends received and deposited securities

US$0.02 per ADS (or portion thereof) not more than once each calendar year and payable at the sole discretion of the depositary by billing holders or deducting such charge from one or more cash dividends or other cash distributions
